title: Example of who benefits from unexpected inflation

content.question: Which of the following individuals benefits from unexpected inflation?

choices.label: A retiree living on a fixed pension
A landlord receiving fixed lease payments
A student saving <math alttext="$10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>$10</mtext></math> each month in a piggy bank
A creditor lending out <math alttext="$1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>$1,000</mtext></math> as a fixed-rate loan
A debtor making payments on existing fixed-rate loans

content.answer: A debtor making payments on existing fixed-rate loans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
